about_the_game:
The four Winds have stopped blowing and the Dark Prince of Dremor is casting the world into darkness. Can you the unexpected hero save the lands of Al'lysca?

Key Features:
  • Retro Inspired 2D Pixel Graphics
  • More than 60 Hand-drawn monsters to fight. All done by artist Jari Feldt.
  • An expansive world to explore. Including 6 different islands and a multitude of dungeons.
  • An original thematic soundtrack that changes based on environments. Composed by Jeremy Beecher.
  • Four different classes to play. The Warrior, The Mage, The Necromancer, and The Knight of the Wilds.
  • Dynamic Day and Night system, with different events that happen based on the time of day.
  • Epic Turn-Based Combat with different abilities for each class.
  • Watch how your attacks affect the monsters during combat.
